Package hep.graphics.heprep.ref

Reference (java) implementation of HepRep.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractHepRepReader This abstract HepRep Reader handles ZipInputStreams, ZipFiles, reads the "heprep.properties" file, allows for properties to be quesried and handles files to be skipped while iterating.
